information: The company FONDERIE MATHIEU, is a Manufacturer/ Producer, founded in 1957, which operates in the Iron, special grade and pig iron industry. It also operates in the Cast iron items, Steels and metals - machining, moulding, and metallurgy industries. It is based in Champforgeuil, France.
